evidence.claim: Agolo utilizes AWS for various cloud services including Lambda and S3 storage.
The company has mentions of FHIR and HL7 standards in their documentation for healthcare-related integrations.
Agolo's engineering careers page highlights the use of modern cloud infrastructure in their projects, including AWS and GCP.
Integration patterns include RESTful APIs and webhook architectures to support data syncing and notifications.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or use cases related to EDI healthcare data exchange.
